content: the stretchy toes shawl pattern skill level confident beginner hook 4mm - fingerling huskyberry ©2025 huskyberry llc all rights reserved gallery stretchy toes shawl - v3 ©2025 huskyberry llc all rights reserved 2 materials yarn brand yarnart flowers or similar amount 1 cake 1000m / 1093 6 yds weight superfine 1 tools hook a 4mm us size g other tools a scissor a tapestry needle for weaving in ends a stitch markers a tape measure a blocking mat & pins blocking blocking the work is recommended to accentuate the design / pattern stretchy toes shawl - v3 ©2025 huskyberry llc all rights reserved 3 gauge pre-blocking measurements row 9 target ~3 5in from center top to tip of ch2 space row 21 target ~8in from center top to tip of ch2 space row 33 target ~13in from center top to tip of ch2 space row 45 target ~18in from center top to tip of ch2 space row 57 target ~23 5in from center top to tip of ch2 space row 65 target ~27in from center top to tip of ch2 space gauge is not critical for this project adjust size by stopping earlier or adding repeats a one cake made 65 row including the border ssttrreettcchhyy ttooeess sshhaawwll -- vv33 ©©22002255 hhuusskkyybbeerrrryy llllcc aallll rriigghhttss rreesseerrvveedd 44 body pattern rules a st / sts stitch / stitches a stitches in & are repeated as indicated a stitches in are worked together in the same stitch / share a space a stitches in < > are worked together in center ch2sp chain rules a center ch2sp never counts in the stitch counts a beginning ch3 always counts as a double_crochet a chains count as stitches in the side stitch counts a when working chains skip the same number of stitches in the below row as you are chaining e g ch2 = skip2 unless indicated otherwise e g ch5 & skip3 magic_ring chain ch3 ch2sp double_crochet magic_ring chain chain 3 chain 2 space double_crochet row 1 | side count 5sts in magic_ring ch3 4dc ch2 5dc turn after the chain 2 repeat the row in the reverse direction until the end of the row r1 note the center chain 2 is never counted the beginning chain 3 always counts as a double_crochet row 2 | side count 9sts ch3 2dc 1dc in each st until center space 2dc ch2 2dc 1dc in each st until one st left 3dc into last st turn when starting even row the first double_crochet symbol = ch3 r2 r1 stretchy toes shawl - v3 ©2025 huskyberry llc all rights reserved 5 body row 3 | side count 13sts ch3 2dc ch1 & skip 3 shell ch1 & skip 3 1dc in last st 2dc ch2 2dc 1dc ch1 & skip 3 shell ch1 & skip 3 3dc in last st turn r3 shell r2 5 double_crochet in same st row 4 | side count 17sts ch3 2dc 1dc in each st until center space 2dc
